name: Totodile
author: Hironobu Yoshida
flavor_text: Its well-developed jaws are powerful and capable of crushing anything. Even its trainer must be careful.

attacks.name: Leer
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon can’t attack Totodile during your opponent’s next turn. (Benching or evolving either Pokémon ends this effect.)

attacks.name: Fury Swipes
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.
